price: He said, “O my people, I am not misguided, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي ضَلَٰلَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
